something i heard from the redis sharing experience nosql 的 redis, is a key-value data store

Redis data model is in its outer layer, a dictionary where keys are mapped to values. Redis supports the following abstract data types: strings, hashes, lists, sets and sorted sets of strings

高性能前端
功能:
sharding
master/slave
VM - 将很少使用的values保存到disk
AOF - 记录命令

Redis 在happy elements用于非关键性的资料，例如用户的好友数据
mysql并发数量很差 - concurrency

Redis has two modes for persistence, 数据恢复:
- One is called snapshotting, one-time write to disk. Loading is fast, but wastes space
- append-only file that is written as operations modifying the dataset in memory are processed. 
Reliable, but loading time is long. Redis is able to rewrite the file to avoid indefinite growth in journal

Redis' performance decreases for big values
but it performs much better than other database for small values
the test is done against Memcached, Memcache_db, TokyoTyrant.
1-5million as key, 100 bytes string value. set, then get test.

VM is a mode
Redis 需要人监控，防止内存饱满

集群
一致性, consistency
可用性, availability
分包可容忍性, tolerance of network partitions
